result.execSummary:
The defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Roberto Jr Fuentez Jr is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Roberto Jr Fuentez Jr was found guilty of Possession of Cocaine/Coca(2nd+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Pay all mandatory court costs, fees, assessments, surcharges including DNA surcharge.  Bail to apply.

Consecutive to: Consecutive to any sentence.  Release for work and to the  Day Reporting Center.  Court notes no objection to electronic monitoring, if allowed, electronic monitoring to include intensive supervision and release for only work and the Day Reporting Center.

Provide DNA sample if not already done.
Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions: firearm possession and voting.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roberto Jr Fuentez Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Bail Refund Packets
9/14/15 per Clerk's office, surety/defendant verified/called Clerk's office on 9/11/15 to confirm correct address should be same as address on affidavit of forgery form.  at
Letter received from Tri City on 8/28/15 giving credit for original ck #333329.
Affidavit of forgery letter sent to bank to request investigation of signed bail refund check.

Letter mailed to defendant informing surety/defendant that the bail refund check was cashed and an affidavit form will need to be completed and returned to the Clerk's office.  The affidavit will be forwarded to the bank for an investigation upon receipt of the affidavit from the surety/defendant.
Letter from defendant requesting bail be sent to him at the HOC.
Bail Refund Check Packet
Bail refund notice/affidavit sent 03/16/15.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Zachary A. Wittchow for Dennis Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Br. 17 for Br. 3.
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  
Court ordered defendant to serve 8 MONTHS in the House of Correction consecutive to any sentence; release for work and to the Day Reporting Center; credit for 11 days time served. Court notes no objection to electronic monitoring, if allowed, electronic monitoring to include intensive supervision and release for only work and the Day Reporting Center. 
- Provide DNA sample, if not already done. 
Pay all mandatory court costs, fees, assessments and surcharges, including the DNA surcharge, with the cash bail deposit. Any remaining balance to be returned to the remitter. 
Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions:  Firearm possession and Voting.

Appellate rights notice given to the defendant. 
Filed;
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
Pretrial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Due to subsititution on 14CF2977, case is adjourned for sentencing hearing in Branch 10.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for March 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw
Defendant's sentencing submissions, received and filed.  aw
Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court. Court will allow defendant to be released on GPS for verifable job interviews and employment.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises defendant to continue with appointments with Justice Point.    
Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 3.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Dennis Murphy.
Attorney Malone is in court before Judge Flanagan, and unable to appear.  Case adjourned for status on 11/10/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  aw  Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Dennis P. Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 

AS TO COUNT 2:
Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of State, Court ordered COUNT 2 dismissed.  Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty.  Judgment of conviction entered.
  
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess any gun or other firearms. 
Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended, and may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.  

Court also advises defendant if he is not a citizen of the United States of America, that upon a plea of guilty or no contest for this offense, he could be deported, excluded from admission to his country, or denied naturalization under federal law.  
Court advised that the defendant will have to provide a DNA sample, to the Wisconsin State Crime Laboratory for DNA testing.
Case adjourned for STATUS on 10/22/2014 at 1:30 pm, branch 3.  Court will set a date for sentincing on the next court date.
Ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement, received and filed.  aw
  Status conference scheduled for October 22, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Dennis P. Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court started taking defendant's plea, and could not find a factual basis.  Case adjourned for plea and sentencing on 10/16/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  aw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 16, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Justice Point letter, received and filed.
Defense counsel has no motions to be filed.  Case adjourned for plea and sentencing on 10/3/2014 at 1:30 pm, branch 3.  aw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 3, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Dennis P. Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for plea and sentencing.  Defense counsel is in intake court today.  Defendant has a pending case going before preliminary court this Friday. Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court.  Janet C Protasiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Bail Forfeiture Hearing proceeds.  In Court is Surety, Emila Lorenzo.  Statements made by both parties.  Court orders bail/bond to remain forfeited.

Defense counsel informs the court that the defendant has been denied admission into drug treatment court.  Case adjourned for plea and sentencing on 7/16/2014 at 1:30 pm, branch 3.  aw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 16, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Dennis Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for plea hearing.  Case is still being staffed for drug treatment court.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 5/27/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3. Court orders defendant to not make any stops when going to other court appearances, and to comply with Justice Point.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 27, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Notice of bail/bond forfeiture mailed to surety and defendant; Original in file. ($1,500.00) ad

14RM021140  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
04-20-14

Court orders defendant's bail forfeited in the amount of $1500.00.  Case bail remains set at $3500.00.  Defendant must post an additional $1500.00 to be released.  Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for ENHANCED Supervision and electronic monitoring.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant may be released for treatment only on electronic monitoring.  aw

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Stephan E Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Dennis Murphy.
Case scheduled for status.  State informs the court that ADA Glamm feels a DPA is not appropriate in this case.  Court also received defendant's confirmation test which came back positive for THC.  Court modifies bail.  Defendant taken into custody.  Case adjourned for projected guilty plea on 5/6/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  aw
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Stephan E Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Nathaniel Adamson.
NO FILE IN COURT.
Court addresses violation report. Defendant tested positive for THC, and has paid the $25.00 to have the test challenged.  Case remains scheduled for scheduling conference on 4/18/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court will modify bail if the test comes back positive.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Dennis P. Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel has no motions to be filed.  Defense counsel is trying to see if a DPA can be approved or for the defendant to get into drug treatment court. Court orders defendant to continue with electronic monitoring.  Defendant has a 24 hour curfew.  Absolutely NO RELEASE FROM HOME.  Order signed and filed.  aw

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R. Malone.  Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in custody. Dennis Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel makes statements on the record about Friday's court proceedings.  Defendant was taken into custody, and has posted bail.  Defendant has not been released yet.  He is waiting for Justice Point.  No need for bail bond hearing.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 3/27/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court ordered all motions be filed by the next court date.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 27, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Court is not forfeiting $2500.00 previously posted.  Defendant must post an additional $1000.00 to be released.  Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for  ENHANCED Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing.   No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  aw

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court.  No Assistant District Attorney appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Clerk left message with attorney Malone and informed him of today's proceedings.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for March 10, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pleads not guilty.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Nathaniel E. Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Konkol.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Fiorenza, Br. 03.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 10, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Report dated 2/24/14.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in custody.  Carole R Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj. No action taken at this time.  Case remains calendared for PRELIMINARY HEARING on FEBRUARY 25, 2014 AT 1:30 in Branch PE.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Paul Hauer for Nathaniel E. Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is in the process of obtaining Attorney D'Arruda to represent him. Court grants one more adjournment.  Court ordered case adjourned for Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Attorney Malone will remain attorney of record at this time.  Court informs defendant that the Preliminary Hearing will commence on the next scheduled court date.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 25, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Kevin Shomin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant requests time to hire private counsel.  Court ordered case adjourned for cause.  Court modified release privileges for obtaining counsel at 2 days per week for 1 and 1/2 hours each.  Court ordered case adjourned for Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for 02-14-2014 at 01:30 pm.

14RM003341  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
1/25/14 vf

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Electronic Monitoring and Supervision.  Defendant to be monitored by drug testing.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Defendant Roberto Jr Fuentez in custody.  Kevin Shomin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense entered a plea of NOT GUILTY as to Count 2.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 3, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
